strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: GMail Icon provides a visual and acoustic notification whenever new mail is in your Google Mail or Google Apps mail account. You can also use it to preview your new mails. Add this gadget multiple times to check more than one account.
strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT:
GMail Icon © 2007 Benjamin Schirmer Get a visual mail notification on your desktop.
Click on the envelope to go to your gmail account. Click on the counter to display a preview of the mails. Doubleclick the counter to go to your gmail account.
strings.strAlwaysAccount: Display account title if mailbox empty
strings.strAppsFix: This is a Google Apps mail address
strings.strNotifyAlert: Show notification alert for new mails
strings.strNotifySound: Play sound notification for new mails
strings.strAlertEnableInformation: Alerts are configured using Google Desktop. Go to the Google Desktop sidebar menu (the downward arrow on the top of the bar) and choose "Configure gadgets...". In the dialog enable Alerts for the GMail Icon gadget. Please note that you must close the options dialog before you can open the sidebar menu.
